headline: Dominion Energy Announces Election of Jeff Lyash as New Independent Director As Part of Continuing Board Refreshment
summary: RICHMOND, Va., June 25, 2025--Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE: D), announced that the company’s board of directors has elected a new independent director, Jeffrey J. "Jeff" Lyash, effective today, June 25.
